Original: Are you the ones who took my request?
I beg you, please save my brother
Raht!
[Page]
He suddenly decided to be an explorer
and left Tharsis on a skyship. He said
he wanted to see Yggdrasil...
[Page]
But the next day... a carrier pigeon
returned with this letter, and...
*sob*
Translation: Are you the ones who took my request?
I beg you, please save my brother
Raht!
[Page]
He suddenly decided to be an explorer
and left Tharsis on a skyship. He said
he wanted to see Yggdrasil...
[Page]
But the next day... a carrier pigeon
returned with this letter, and...
*sob*

Original: "Dear sister,
How are you? It's me, your brother
Raht. This may be the end for me...
[Page]
"On my first day here, I saw a curious
sight. Near a cave, two beasts were
dancing around, as if beckoning me.
[Page]
"It was just like the Outland Count
Polka you loved when Father took us.
But when I got close, my luck ran out.
[Page]
"It was all a trap laid by the
monster! With nimble steps, the
beast quickly charged at me!
[Page]
"I hastily veered to the left, but it
was too late. I was caught. My ship,
like my spirit, was broken...
[Page]
"I'll probably die here. Don't look
for me... there's no need. Forget
your brother and live a full life."
Translation: "Dear sister,
How are you? It's me, your brother
Raht. This may be the end for me...
[Page]
"On my first day here, I saw a curious
sight. Near a cave, two beasts were
dancing around, as if beckoning me.
[Page]
"It was just like the Outland Count
Polka you loved when Father took us.
But when I got close, my luck ran out.
[Page]
"It was all a trap laid by the
monster! With nimble steps, the
beast quickly charged at me!
[Page]
"I hastily veered to the left, but it
was too late. I was caught. My ship,
like my spirit, was broken...
[Page]
"I'll probably die here. Don't look
for me... there's no need. Forget
your brother and live a full life."

Original: What does he mean, there's "no need"
to find him!? How can I ignore this!?
My brother has crash landed somewhere!
[Page]
Please find him and tell me where he
is! Once you know, I can send in a
dedicated rescue team.
Translation: What does he mean, there's "no need"
to find him!? How can I ignore this!?
My brother has crash landed somewhere!
[Page]
Please find him and tell me where he
is! Once you know, I can send in a
dedicated rescue team.

Original: Oh, did you find my brother Raht?
Translation: Oh, did you find my brother Raht?

Original: [Color:5]Have you found him?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Have you found him?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Oh... My brother's situation is
becoming more perilous by the second.
Please... you must hurry!
Translation: Oh... My brother's situation is
becoming more perilous by the second.
Please... you must hurry!

Original: I believe my brother's letter holds
a clue to his location. I'll read it
to you again.
Translation: I believe my brother's letter holds
a clue to his location. I'll read it
to you again.

Original: Oh, my brother...! Where did he see
the Outland Count Polka?
Translation: Oh, my brother...! Where did he see
the Outland Count Polka?

Original: Really!? Then please... tell me where!
Translation: Really!? Then please... tell me where!

Original: I understand! I'll send for help
at once!
Translation: I understand! I'll send for help
at once!

Original: I just heard from the rescue team...
My brother wasn't where you told me
you'd found him...
[Page]
Did you really find my brother?
If you did, please tell me exactly
where that was!
Translation: I just heard from the rescue team...
My brother wasn't where you told me
you'd found him...
[Page]
Did you really find my brother?
If you did, please tell me exactly
where that was!

Original: Everyone... My brother has been found!
He was just taken to the clinic!
[Page]
Thank you... thank you so much!
I don't even know what to say...
[Page]
I already told the lady at the bar,
so you can take the reward anytime.
[Page]
I'm worried about my brother, though.
I don't think he learned anything
from this at all...
Translation: Everyone... My brother has been found!
He was just taken to the clinic!
[Page]
Thank you... thank you so much!
I don't even know what to say...
[Page]
I already told the lady at the bar,
so you can take the reward anytime.
[Page]
I'm worried about my brother, though.
I don't think he learned anything
from this at all...

Original: My brother doesn't usually have that
much energy... I'm amazed he ever
worked up the nerve to go exploring.
Translation: My brother doesn't usually have that
much energy... I'm amazed he ever
worked up the nerve to go exploring.
